text: Saza emva koko Senza iqabaza (elo) lembewu yomntu laba lihlwili elinamathelayo. Saphinda Senza iqabaza lembewu yomntu laba ligaqa (lesihlunu), Saza Senza egaqeni (elo) amathambo; Saza Sawagquma amathambo ngenyama; Saphinda Samphuhlisa waba sesinye isidalwa. Ngoko ke Usikelelekile uAll√¢h, Ongoyena Mdali Ugqibeleleyo kubadali
